name: wlp-calendar
description: One of several core D3-based WorldLine Project components that is an interactive heatmap calendar for selecting specific date ranges (day, week, month, year).
author: Jamie Williams

scripts.bundle: node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\";export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js
scripts.rollup: rollup -f umd -g d3:d3,d3-tip:d3.tip -n wlp_calendar -o build/wlp-calendar.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && npm run bundle && npm run rollup && npm run css
scripts.build: rm -f build/wlp-calendar.zip && zip -j build/wlp-calendar.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/wlp-calendar.js build/wlp-calendar.css build/wlp-calendar.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run uglify && npm run build
